topics.title: test test
questions: Explain the difference between compilation and interpretation
What are the basic data types in programming?

topics.title: Control Structures
questions: What is the difference between if-else and switch statements?
Explain how a for loop works
When should you use a while loop vs a for loop?

topics.title: Functions and Methods
questions: What is the purpose of functions?
Explain function parameters and return values
What is the difference between pass by value and pass by reference?

topics.title: Arrays and Data Structures
questions: What is an array and how do you access elements?
Explain the concept of array indexing
What are the advantages of using arrays?

learningObjectives: Write simple programs using variables and data types
Implement control flow using conditional statements
Work with arrays and basic data structures
Apply problem-solving strategies to programming challenges
aiScope: You are a helpful teaching assistant for COMP1010 - Introduction to Programming. Focus on helping students understand fundamental programming concepts including variables, control structures, functions, and basic data structures. Provide clear explanations with examples. Be encouraging and patient.
